com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class TalkTopic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.TalkTopic

  • public class TalkTopic
extends Object
    Represents a topic of discussion with an NPC

    NOTE: since TalkTopics are always retrieved from a topicMap, and thus the same TalkTopic instance will always be retrieved for a given key, we can compare and hash TalkTopics by identity, and don't need to write hashCode and equals methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      List<TalkTopic> addTopics
      If this topic is selected, these topics should be added to the topic list
      String key
      Unique topic key, as found in the topic map
      String label
      Topic as shown to the user in the list dialog.
      List<TalkTopic> removeTopics
      If this topic is selected, these topics should be removed from the topic list
      String text
      What the NPC will say for this topic.

    • Field Detail

      • key

        public String key
        Unique topic key, as found in the topic map

      • label

        public String label
        Topic as shown to the user in the list dialog. There can be multiple TalkTopics with the same label, if the NPC will say different things depending on circumstances.

      • text

        public String text
        What the NPC will say for this topic.

      • addTopics

        public List<TalkTopic> addTopics
        If this topic is selected, these topics should be added to the topic list

      • removeTopics

        public List<TalkTopic> removeTopics
        If this topic is selected, these topics should be removed from the topic list
